definition: a tight sleeveless and collarless jacket, often made of leather, primarily worn by men in the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries
details:
noun
- a tight sleeveless and collarless jacket, often made of leather, primarily worn by men in the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries
